mapper.insert:
insert into saleboard (sb_title,sb_id, sb_category, sb_startprice, sb_count, sb_contents, sb_timer, sb_buylevel, sb_date, sb_salekind, sb_local, sb_scope) values (#{sb_title},#{m_id}, #{sb_category}, #{sb_startprice}, #{sb_count}, #{sb_contents}, #{sb_timer}, #{sb_buylevel}, default, 3, '핫딜상품', 1)
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select sb_num, sb_title, sb_startprice, sb_contents, sb_category, sb_count, sb_buylevel, date_format(sb_timer,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') sb_timer_str, bf_orifilename, bf_sysfilename from saleboard left join boardfile on sb_num=bf_sb_num where sb_salekind = 3 and sb_scope = 1 order by sb_num desc limit #{startIdx}, #{listCnt}

select sb_num, sb_title, sb_startprice, sb_contents, sb_category, sb_count, sb_timer, sb_buylevel, date_format(sb_timer,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') sb_timer_str, bf_orifilename, bf_sysfilename from saleboard left join boardfile on sb_num=bf_sb_num order by sb_num desc limit #{startIdx}, #{listCnt}

select sb_num, sb_title, sb_startprice, sb_contents, sb_category, sb_count, sb_timer, sb_buylevel, date_format(sb_timer,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') sb_timer_str, bf_orifilename, bf_sysfilename from saleboard left join boardfile on sb_num=bf_sb_num where sb_num=#{sb_num}

select sb_num, sb_title, sb_startprice, sb_contents, sb_category, sb_count, sb_timer, sb_buylevel, date_format(sb_timer,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') sb_timer_str, bf_orifilename, bf_sysfilename from saleboard left join boardfile on sb_num=bf_sb_num where sb_num=#{sb_num}

select count(*) from saleboard
where sb_title like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or sb_contents like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')
